title: Exhaust in the view of a talon main
body:
How is exhaust even allowed to be as overpowered as it is? It completely negates an assassin's entire kit with one click and the CD is extremely short so there is no real window of opportunity in the late game, and one exhaust in the late game is all it takes to win... For the love of god change this summoner spell, no summoner spell should have THAT much of an impact in a game. It's supposed to be used as a special tool to save you when you make a mistake, not remove an entire champion from a fight..
~Sincerely Talon main who is still salty about the silence nerf but soraka's huge silence pool buff.

this is generally how talon works in teamfights: he waits until the action begins and people lose their focus on him, then he runs in with  ghostblade and probably flash, jumps on the backline, unleashes his burst and tiamat in one big instant combo and gets the fuck out until his cooldowns are back up. sure talon probably is one of the assassins who are more likely to die, but generally speaking you are not on a suicide mission here.

also, exhaust isnt there to get you out of mistakes. its EXACTLY to take out major threats for a short window of time so you can either ignore or fight them.
the only summoner spell designed for real noobs to get out of fuck-ups is flash, but you use that yourself so dont complain.
